label: Available
description: Sellable inventory that can be promised to customers

label: Out of Stock
description: Temporarily unavailable but expected to return

label: Discontinued
description: No longer sold and hidden from listings

label: Back Ordered
description: Demand exceeds supply and requires supplier fulfilment

label: Reserved
description: Allocated to customer orders awaiting shipment

label: Awaiting QA
description: Items waiting for quality assurance checks

label: Pre-order
description: Products announced but not yet available
